thread.title: Homemade cola ice lollies

author: Xanthe Clay
title: Homemade cola ice lollies
text: The chief flavours in cola are lime and cinnamon, and mixed with some caramelly date syrup (or bit of brown sugar) youâ€™ve got a natural, homemade alternative to the classic sugar rush. SERVES 4-6 INGREDIENTS 2 limes, juice and zest Juice of half a lemon 4 tbsp date syrup or light brown sugar Cinnamon stick, broken 500ml with water METHOD Put the grated zest of two limes in a pan with 4 tbsp date syrup or light brown sugar, a broken cinnamon stick and a mugful of water. Simmer for five minutes, cool, and add the juice of the limes plus the juice of half a lemon. Strain into a measuring jug and make up to 500ml with water. Taste and add a bit more sugar or syrup if necessary, then pour into moulds and freeze.
